activities.name: Confirm and map 35 sites for DigiGreen Centers
activities.description: Confirm all 35 DigiGreen center sites with local authorities and map locations
activities.notes: 34/35 sites confirmed. Mairie d'Abobo pending due to lack of official letter from mayor.

activities.name: Design DigiGreen Centers
activities.description: Design DigiGreen Centers including infrastructure, equipment, connectivity, and operations specifications
activities.notes: 34/35 plans approved. Grand Bassam site changed Dec 2025, new design plan required Jan 2026.

activities.name: Define and formalize governance with universities and Mairies
activities.description: Sign governance agreements with all center host institutions including universities and municipal authorities
activities.notes: 34/35 agreements signed. Abobo agreement pending mayor's signature.

activities.name: Roll out DigiGreen Centers in 35 locations
activities.description: Complete renovation, equipment installation, connectivity setup, and operationalize all 35 DigiGreen centers
activities.notes: 7/35 centers operational (Phase I). Phase II centers delayed to mid-2026 due to contractor mobilization delays.

activities.name: Develop long-term strategy and resource mobilization
activities.description: Develop comprehensive strategy for long-term sustainability and resource mobilization for DigiGreen Centers
activities.notes: Planned for 2027. Activity focuses on developing sustainability and resource mobilization strategy.

activities.name: Develop basic ICT training modules applied to green practices
activities.description: Develop Basic ICT training curriculum including Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint with green practices integration
activities.notes: Basic ICT training modules (Word, Excel, PPT) fully developed. Ready for deployment.

activities.name: Make basic ICT training modules available in DigiGreen Centers
activities.description: Upload and configure basic ICT training modules in cloud-based LMS for all DigiGreen Centers
activities.notes: 100% of Basic ICT modules uploaded to Moodle LMS. Accessible for self-paced learning.

activities.name: Develop and integrate green practices curriculum in ToT program
activities.description: Develop Green Practices curriculum (6 modules) and integrate into Training of Trainers program
activities.notes: Green Practices curriculum (6 modules) completed and uploaded to LMS by Impact Lab in Aug 2025.

activities.name: Recruit trainers from host DigiGreen Center locations
activities.description: Recruit 105 trainers from host institutions across all DigiGreen Centers
activities.notes: 102/105 trainers recruited. 3 positions pending for Phase II centers (Mairie de Treichville).

activities.name: Train trainers (teachers) through ToT program
activities.description: Complete ToT certification for all recruited trainers on basic ICT and green practices
activities.notes: 21/105 trainers certified (Phase I only). 81 others attended in-person but missing online modules. Catch-up Feb 2026.

activities.name: Identify students from schools and TVET centers
activities.description: Identify and enroll university students and secondary/TVET students in basic ICT and green practices program
activities.notes: University: 0/7,830 enrolled. Secondary/TVET: 111/26,100 enrolled (LPIA Treichville pilot). Expansion Q1-Q2 2026.

activities.name: Deliver basic ICT and green practices training to students
activities.description: Deliver training and assess student pass rates and satisfaction through midterm/final assessments and surveys
activities.notes: 0/21,715 students passed (assessment begins Jan 20, 2026). Survey tools designed, data collection Q1 2026.

activities.name: Develop ICT Academy curricula for digital certification and green solutions
activities.description: Develop Application Master program (UI/UX, iOS, Android) and Green Business Fundamentals curriculum
activities.notes: 2 advanced programs developed: App Master and Green Business Fundamentals. iOS adapted to conceptual due to hardware constraints.

activities.name: Make ICT Academy curricula available in DigiGreen Centers
activities.description: Upload ICT Academy curricula to LMS with interactive presentations, videos, and quizzes
activities.notes: 100% of advanced curriculum uploaded to LMS (App Master & Green Business tracks).

activities.name: Organize Training of Trainers for advanced trainers
activities.description: Recruit and certify 19 advanced trainers for ICT Academy and Green Business Fundamentals
activities.notes: 0/19 certified. 8 completed online modules. In-person certification Feb 2026; remaining phased with center availability.

activities.name: Train university students through the ICT Academy program
activities.description: Enroll university students, deliver ICT Academy training, assess pass rates and satisfaction
activities.notes: 30/900 enrolled (pilot), 22 graduated with 100% satisfaction. Cohort 2 (120 students) recruitment Jan 2026.

activities.name: Define the Greenpreneur incubation program framework
activities.description: Design comprehensive Greenpreneur incubation program structure, goals, and selection criteria
activities.notes: Program structure finalized including selection criteria, training modules, and mentorship framework.

activities.name: Select Greenpreneurs through a call for applications
activities.description: Conduct calls for applications and select Greenpreneurs for incubation program
activities.notes: 2/3 calls conducted (181 applications total). Low regional response. 2026 strategy includes early launch and localized outreach.

activities.name: Develop and host Greenpreneur training modules in DigiGreen Centers
activities.description: Develop 10-module Greenpreneur curriculum and host in DigiGreen Centers
activities.notes: 10-module curriculum completed by Impact Lab/Barka (Q3 2025). Includes Financial Modeling, Eco-Prototyping, Impact Modeling.

activities.name: Recruit mentors to support Greenpreneurs
activities.description: Implement mentor recruitment process for Greenpreneur program
activities.notes: RFP launched Jan 17, 2026; shortlist by Jan 30; mentor matching by Jan 31; mentorship delivery Feb 1-21, 2026.

activities.name: Promote and manage the Greenpreneur program with government partners
activities.description: Conduct promotional activities across 6 universities and 9 Mairies with government partners
activities.notes: 23/60 promotional activities conducted including 4 webinars and 4 center launch events. 2026 targets 15+ activities.

activities.name: Organize in-person Greenpreneur focus groups in DigiGreen Centers
activities.description: Deliver Greenpreneur incubation training and collect satisfaction assessments
activities.notes: 112/675 greenpreneurs trained (50% of 2025 target). 90% satisfaction rate. 2026 targets 264 via hybrid model.

activities.name: Deliver mentorship courses on country and market-specific issues
activities.description: Organize and deliver mentorship program sessions for Greenpreneurs
activities.notes: Delayed to Q1 2026. Mentor recruitment framework finalized. Mentorship delivery Feb 1-21, 2026.

activities.name: Organize networking events for Greenpreneurs
activities.description: Organize networking events connecting greenpreneurs with investors and partners
activities.notes: 2/6 networking events completed (online format). Topics: Company Structuration, Fundraising. 2026 hybrid model.

activities.name: Organize pitch competition linking startups to early-stage funding
activities.description: Organize annual pitch competition for green business ideas with seed capital disbursement
activities.notes: First pitch competition scheduled late Feb 2026. 25+ eligible finalists. USD 100k disbursement Mar 2026.

activities.name: Identify network of early-stage funders and venture capital institutions
activities.description: Identify and engage early-stage funders including venture capital and incubators
activities.notes: 10/4 funders engaged (250% of target) including SGPME CI and COMOE Capital. MoUs signed.

activities.name: Establish the GGGI Greenpreneur Fund (USD 300,000)
activities.description: Establish and manage the GGGI Greenpreneur Fund for seed capital disbursement to pitch winners
activities.notes: USD 0 disbursed. Fund establishment pending framework finalization. USD 100k disbursement post-Feb 2026 pitch.

activities.name: Organize Green Business Forum linking government, private sector and investors
activities.description: Organize Green Business Forum with target of 100 participants from government, private sector, and investors
activities.notes: Forum scheduled for 2027 with 100 participants target.

activities.name: Conduct policy review on incentives supporting Greenpreneur sustainability
activities.description: Conduct policy review and develop recommendations for green economy incentives
activities.notes: Policy reviews (Enabling Environment & Ecosystem Mapping) inception reports submitted Dec 2025. Final reports Q2 2026.

activities.name: Design and launch Green Leadership Academy (3-month program)
activities.description: Launch Green Leadership Academy for youth leaders with 3-month program
activities.notes: Delayed to Jan 2026 due to curriculum finalization. Cohort 1 (30 participants) recruitment underway.

activities.name: Organize study tour in GGGI Greenpreneurship network countries
activities.description: Organize international study tour for stakeholders to learn from best practices
activities.notes: First tour rescheduled to late March 2026 (10 participants: 6 govt, 4 GGGI).

activities.name: Develop publications and knowledge products on green business solutions
activities.description: Develop and disseminate green growth publications and knowledge products to stakeholders
activities.notes: 227/9,600 stakeholders reached. 0/5 publications disseminated; 8 drafts pending QA. Scale-up 2026.
